message: Use the ← and → arrow keys to switch between theme colours of the timetable and press X to toggle between light and dark modes!
Bookmarking modules can help you access them quickly from the Bookmark icon ( ) in the top navigation bar.
You can quickly navigate between the pages by pressing M for Module finder, T for Timetable builder and P for Preferences.
Pressing . highlights the timetable page's search bar so that you can add modules to your timetable quickly.
Pressing / highlights the search bar at the top so that you can search for modules easily.

On a module's page, you can quickly navigate between the various sections using keyboard shortcuts! Press E to jump to the prerequisities section, R to jump to the reviews section, C to jump to the CORS bidding history section and S to jump to the lesson schedule section.
NUSMods supports many keyboard shortcuts to make usage super easy. Check them out here. Press ? and see what happens!
